testsuite.name: Challenge Sistecredito

testcase.name: Enter products and finalize purchase

failure.message: io.cucumber.core.exception.CucumberException: Step [it shows the process of the purchase completed successfully] is defined with 1 parameters at 'retosistecredito.stepdefinitions.retoSistecreditoStepDefinitions.itShowsTheProcessOfThePurchaseCompletedSuccessfully(java.lang.String)'. However, the gherkin step has 0 arguments. Step text: it shows the process of the purchase completed successfully
